message.content:
Here is your customized weekly menu without the specified allergens or ingredients (dairy products, certain nuts). You can enjoy a variety of flavors while sticking to healthy options. 

**Day One - Monday**  
Breakfast: Avocado Toast with Gluten-Free Bread and Poached Eggs   
Lunch: Grilled Chicken Salad (with mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes) dressed in olive oil vinaigrette    
Dinner: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers  
Snack Option 1: Fresh fruit salad with a squeeze of lime   
Snack Option 2: Rice cakes topped with sunflower seed butter (substitute for almond or peanut butter)    

**Day Two - Tuesday**  
Breakfast: Oatmeal made with coconut milk, blueberries, and chia seeds   
Lunch: Turkey Wrap using a lettuce leaf instead of tortilla (with avocado slices), cucumber sticks on the side    
Dinner: Baked Salmon with Asparagus  
Snack Option 1: Carrot sticks and hummus      
Snack Option 2: Banana smoothie made with almond milk substitute (like oat or coconut)   

**Day Three - Wednesday**  
Breakfast: Smoothie Bowl with spinach, mixed berries, flax seeds, and a dairy-free yogurt alternative    
Lunch: Quinoa Salad Bowls (with black beans, corn, avocado)      
Dinner: Grilled Shrimp with Steamed Broccoli   
Snack Option 1: Apple slices       
Snack Option 2: Dates and seed mix    

**Day Four - Thursday**  
Breakfast: Chia Seed Pudding made with oat milk, topped with fresh fruit (like mango or kiwi)   
Lunch: Rice Noodle Stir Fry with mixed vegetables and shrimp    
Dinner: Baked Tilapia with a side of sweet potato fries     
Snack Option 1: Kale chips made in the oven (avoid garlic-infused varieties)      
Snack Option 2: Homemade popcorn seasoned lightly with nutritional yeast    

**Day Five - Friday**  
Breakfast: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Mushrooms served on a gluten-free toast   
Lunch: Chicken Caesar Salad (without croutons or anchovy dressing, use dairy-free Parmesan alternative)      
Dinner: Beef Stew made using homemade bone broth with root vegetables    
Snack Option 1: Celery sticks and guacamole       
Snack Option 2: A peach or nectarine   

**Day Six - Saturday**  
Breakfast: Pumpkin Seed Granola served over coconut yogurt     
Lunch: Tuna Salad (without mayo, use avocado) on a bed of arugula    
Dinner: Lemon-Herb Roasted Chicken Thighs with roasted Brussels sprouts   
Snack Option 1: Mixed berries bowl     
Snack Option 2: Homemade rice cakes (ensure no cross-contamination with allergens)    

**Day Seven - Sunday**  
Breakfast: Savory Breakfast Hash made from sweet potatoes, bell peppers, and onions   
Lunch: Vegan Lentil Soup served with a slice of gluten-free bread (ensure it's dairy and nut free)       
Dinner: Grilled Teriyaki Chicken Thighs with sautéed zucchini    
Snack Option 1: Cucumber slices dipped in baba ganoush made from tahini alternative  
Snack Option 2: A bowl of mixed fresh fruit (avoid any potential allergen cross-contamination)
